overview: In the original Slut Tracker, director John Leslie and his camera stalked promiscuous babes in search of voyeuristic thrills. In the new Slut Tracker #2 he hardly needs to search; oversexed horndogs put their business right in his path, so hungry are they for the thrill of exhibitionism and potential fame. The four brand new scenes here, completed before the legendary director's untimely passing, show the trademarks he was known for: terrific young talent; revealing camera work; a knack for storytelling that allows viewers to interpret the action in their own kinky ways.
title: Slut Tracker 2
